body.section: You can test processes by pressing the Execute button in the lower right corner of the window. To view a history of the process’s execution, click on the View drop-down menu above the process diagram panel and click His­tory. The screen will look similar to the example shown in .
The history view shows when each task in the process was executed and the result. Tasks are initially shown in task id order. Click on the Date column to view tasks in date order.
